Sentencas: There is inconsistency in the stack of multi-stack Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) system, which can affect the efficiency and lifespan of the system.
Titulo: Inconsistency analysis and power allocation of the stack in multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: To improve the overall performance of the system when the stacks are inconsistent, the paper analyzes the impact of stack inconsistency and designs a power allocation strategy based on improved generalized predictive control (GPC).
Titulo: Inconsistency analysis and power allocation of the stack in multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The types of stack inconsistency have been identified and online detection methods have been proposed at first.
Titulo: Inconsistency analysis and power allocation of the stack in multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Then, through stack inconsistency analysis, it can be found that stack inconsistency can seriously affect the efficiency and lifespan of the system and the system lifespan can be maximized by adjusting the current.
Titulo: Inconsistency analysis and power allocation of the stack in multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Furthermore, the following research also indicates that the point where the system has the highest lifespan is also the point where the overall performance of the system is optimal.
Titulo: Inconsistency analysis and power allocation of the stack in multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Finally, to achieve the best performance of the system during actual operation, the paper designs a power allocation strategy based on improved generalized predictive control.
Titulo: Inconsistency analysis and power allocation of the stack in multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The simulation results also show that the power allocation strategy designed in this paper can adjust the power of the stack in real -time online, ensuring maximum system lifespan and optimal overall performance.
Titulo: Inconsistency analysis and power allocation of the stack in multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system
